definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: murmur, only Ex 15, Ex 16, Ex 17, Nu 14, Nu 16, Nu 17, and Jos 9:18 (Sam. always defect., hence Nö:ZMG xxxvii.1883, 535n. thinks poss. [[לנן]] [cf. [[רנן]] ?]; from limited occurrence, he supposes it disappeared early; but found chiefly in P);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיִּלּוֹ֫נוּ]] Ex 15:24 + 3 t. + Ex 16:2 Qr (Kt [[וילינו]]) + Nu 14:36 Kt (Qr [[וַיַּלִּי֫נוּ]],

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ); 2 mpl. [[תִּלּוֹ֫נוּ]] Ex 16:7, Nu 16:11, both Kt (Qr [[תַּלִּי֫נוּ]]); on forms v. Ges:§ 72 Anm. 8 Kö:i. 509;—murmur against, sq. [[עַל]] Ex 15:24 (JE), Ex 16:2, Ex 16:7, Nu 14:2, Nu 16:11, Nu 17:6, Jos 9:18 (all P ; all of people Isr.); abs. Ps 59:16 (v. I. [[לון]]1 a).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 mpl. [[הֲלִינׁתֶם]] Nu 14:29; Impf. [[וַיָּ֫לֶן]] Ex 17:3; [[וַיַּלִּי֫נוּ]] Ex 16:2 Kt, Nu 14:36 Qr; 2 mpl. [[תַּלִּי֫נוּ]] Ex 16:7 Qr, Nu 16:11 Qr (on all vid. supr.); Pt. pl. [[מַלִּינִים]] Ex 16:8 + 3 t.;—murmur = Niph., sq. [[על]] Ex 17:3 (E), elsewhere P: 16:8, Nu 14:27, Nu 14:27, Nu 14:29, Nu 17:5; cause to murmur, sq. acc. + [[עַל]] Nu 14:36 Qr; (cf. also supra
